timeline.bodyText: Should these string comparers be case insensitive? I know some file systems are not, but probably best we do it that pretend like they are.
timeline.author: sixlettervariables

replies.bodyText: I'm not certain, but they are how we handle it currently (no change, just abstracted out)
replies.author: Windchild292
